articles.content:
Credentials to Kim Yong Nam 
    Pyongyang, May 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Bashir Ramadan Khalifa Abu Janah, secretary of the People's Bureau of Libya to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 On hand were Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Choe Su Hon and staff members of the People's Bureau here.    
 After receiving credentials Kim Yong Nam had a talk with the secretary.
